snippet: At a rally for Mitt Romney in New Hampshire, the presidential candidate was dry and awkward, while Chris Christie was his foil, full of juice and genuine conservatism.
abstract: At a rally for Mitt Romney in New Hampshire, the presidential candidate was dry and awkward, while Chris Christie was his foil, full of juice and genuine conservatism.
lead_paragraph: EXETER, N.H. - Mitt Romney is not having a good time in New Hampshire. Apparently he really likes to fire people. And he's actually willing to say so.

headline.main: Mitt Romney's Search for Something Not Embarrassing to Say
